content.en: AQM Algorithm Comparison: Researchers have compared different algorithms used for Active Queue Management (AQM) to improve congestion control in networks. The Pro-Active Queue Management (PAQM) scheme has been found to outperform other AQM algorithms such as Random Early Detection (RED), Random Early Marking (REM), and Proportional-Integral (PI) controller. Additionally, the Proportional-Integral-Derivative (PID)-controller has been shown to outperform RED and PI controller algorithms. These findings suggest that these adaptive and proactive AQM algorithms can address the problems of existing AQM proposals and improve network performance.
content.da: Sammenligning af AQM-algoritmer: Forskere har sammenlignet forskellige algoritmer, der bruges til Aktiv Køstyring (AQM) for at forbedre overbelastningskontrol i netværk. Det Pro-Aktive Køstyringsskema (PAQM) har vist sig at overgå andre AQM-algoritmer som Random Early Detection (RED), Random Early Marking (REM) og Proportional-Integral (PI) controller. Desuden er det blevet påvist, at Proportional-Integral-Derivative (PID)-controlleren overgår RED og PI controller-algoritmer. Disse resultater tyder på, at disse adaptive og proaktive AQM-algoritmer kan løse problemerne ved eksisterende AQM-forslag og forbedre netværksydelsen.
